subject: ✅ HarmonyJunction Status - All Systems Go
body:
Team,

## HARMONY JUNCTION STATUS

| Item | Status |
|------|--------|
| HJ Frontend | ✅ PROD (15ea203) |
| MapCenter appId=2 | ✅ Verified working |
| Firebase Auth | ✅ Working (tangotiempo-257ff) |
| Affiliations Filter | ✅ UI deployed (demo) |

## VERIFIED TODAY
- MapCenter save/fetch with appId=2 ✅
- Large radiusMiles (2500mi for HJ) ✅
- User authentication flow ✅

## PENDING
- **userlogins 404** - Awaiting Ben's TEST deploy
- **Affiliations backend** - Future work (JIRA pending)

## READY FOR
- Any testing needed
- Next feature work

Thanks Fulton for the BE-AF fixes!

- Cord (HarmonyJunction, appId=2)
